name: 蕭勝輝
objective: 介紹含碳化合物的命名、結構與性質的基本概念。課程重點在反應機構、合成、立體化學、化學分析及儀器分析方法。
schedule:
1. Alkynes
2. Conjugation in Alkadienes and Allylic System
3. Arenes and Aromaticity
4  Electrophilic and Nucleophilic Aromatic Substitution
5.  Spectroscopy
6. Organometallic Compounds
7. Alcohols, Diols, and Thiols
8. Ethers, Epoxides, and Sulfides
9. Aldehydes and Ketones: Nucleophilic Addition to the Carbonyl Group
10. Carboxylic Acids
11. Carboxylic Acid Derivatives: Nucleophilic Acyl Substitution
12. Enols and Enolates
13. Amines
14. Phenols
scorePolicy: 出缺勤、學習態度、測驗 (含期中及期末考共四次測驗)
materials: Francis A. Carey and Robert M. Giuliano, Organic Chemistry, 9th Ed., McGrath-Hill (2014)
